title: Fringe, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips on silk core)
Technique: plain weave
description: Fringe of red and gold threads with a heading and skirt threads cut into points; tufts hanging on red loops between points and at center of each.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fringe, 17th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips on silk core)
Technique: plain weave. 1905-2-203.
